sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: This routine is used to create a patch object that can be plotting 2D and 3D surfaces. A patch is a polygon defined by the xyz coordinates of its vertices and optionally by the color at the vertices. There are several forms for the patch function: h = patch(X,Y,C,properties...) h = patch(X,Y,Z,C,properties...) h = patch(properties...) h = patch(V) Where X, Y and Z are matrices or vectors of x, y or z coordinates and C is a matrix or vector of color values (the colormap for the current fig is applied).
